description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored 'What Is Ecosystem Architecture' and curated 'Align The Misaligned.'
blurb: Ecosystem architecture merges decentralization with regenerative design, leveraging diverse fields to build and sustain healthy, distributed networks and communities.
